item.title: Advanced tips
item.description: MacOS advanced tips If your prefer to install the BornAgain python libraries not to the site-packages folder of your Python interpreter, but to some custom folder, you can do this in a following way. Run the bornagain_install_python.py script from application bundle: $ python /Applications/BornAgain.app/Contents/libexec/BornAgain-1.16/bornagain_python_install.py Choose the option ‘[0]’ - Generate bundle with BornAgain libraries, do not install it. You will get a message: ... BornAgain Python bundle is successfully created in temporary directory '/var/folders/zt/0l4f_l_d46v5rkx668jqx0b4000lw7/T/bornagain_bundle' .
